New Records: Harmeet Singh scored the fastest 26 runs in T20I history
Key Match Events: USA won the match by 5 wickets
Corey Anderson hit a six in the final over
Harmeet Singh hit two consecutive sixes in the 16th over
Mahmudullah played a good hand of 31 runs
Pre-Game Insights: USA won the toss and opted to bowl against Bangladesh in the first of the three-match T20I series in Houston
Post-Match Reflections: Monank Patel expressed happiness with the way USA played
Najmul Hossain Shanto felt extra 20 runs could have made the difference for Bangladesh
Miscellaneous Highlights: The spinners came out on top for both teams
Bangladesh's spinners struggled to control the middle phase
USA's bowlers, especially Steven Taylor, did well to keep Bangladesh quiet for the majority of the first 10 overs
